name: Frustração
description:
I've made this game to cause rage on the Players.

It's not impossible, it's annoying. 

If you are like me, that have this need to beat a game, maybe you will like it!

Also this my first game ever developed, so it have some little unexpected 'features'.

I'm not an Artist, so the arts are not mine and I have no intentions in creating it.

GL & HF
